entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using same type as nested owned property cause "Attempted to update or delete an entity that does not exist in the store" in disconnected state. #29877
  • Replacing PK to PK dependent with different type fails using in-memory provider #29875
  • Replacing PK to PK TPT or TPC dependent with different type fails #29874
  • Validate that the type mapping has a value comparer if the type is a non IEquatable reference type #29873
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Cosmos create too many IServiceProvider #29872

Closed

  • EF 7.0.1: EFCore 7.0 Bug - Invalid Operation Exception RE "Temporary Value" #29871
  • Allow UseSequence and HiLo on non-key properties #29758
    8.0.0
  • FromSqlInterpolated causes 'nvarchar' is not a recognized CURSOR option error #29870

PullRequests

Created

  • Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29876

Merged

  • Don't validate shared columns have the same provider type unless they are used in a key, foreign key or a unique index #29866
  • Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29805
  • Allow SQLServer Sequence/HiLo on non-key properties #29864
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Most of explicit and lazy loading for no-tracking queries #29865
  • [release/7.0] Revert shared columns validation breaking change #29867
    Servicing-consider
